main event: On April 29, 1955, in G Wernerm, Germany, an object hovered for a short time, then moved straight up and disappeared, as reported by SAT Information.
interesting points: The object was brilliantly bright, circular in shape, and reflected intense light.
It remained stationary and was nearly silent during the observation.
The object stopped vertically before departing vertically, indicating unusual movement capabilities.
The sighting was not reported to the authorities at the time.
The observation lasted only a few minutes.
